We are so blessed and thankful to god that we got to meet Dr Rachna. She not only made sure to educate us about our situation and challenges but worked with us on overcoming them. Her faith and positivity brought strength to us every time we visited. During my pregnancy journey she has played a vital role and during delivery. 
With her expertise and experience I delivered a baby boy normally and post delivery care and guidance has been on point. 
We are happy and proud parents and we express our gratitude and love to Dr Rachna always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),PCOD/PCOS Treatment,
review:
I just wanted to drop you a quick note to say a massive thank to Dr. Rachna Verma and her husband for being such a rockstar throughout my pregnancy and delivery journey. Seriously, you've been amazing!
I visited doctor for my PCOS issue, doctor listen to our problems very carefully, made us feel totally comfortable and taken care of. I got pregnant during the treatment.  I experienced some unexpected bleeding early on, and let me tell you, it was terrifying. But thanks to Dr. Rachna's expertise and care, alongside the diligence of the Sir, we navigated through it with confidence.
Doctor took the time to thoroughly assess the situation, explain everything in a way that was easy to understand, and most importantly, provided reassurance that everything would be okay. Their calm and composed demeanor helped ease my worries and gave me the strength to stay positive throughout my pregnancy journey.
And when it came time for delivery, I couldn't have asked for a better captain of the ship. Your cool, calm, and collected vibe kept us all grounded, and your quick thinking made everything go smoother than I could have imagined.
My little one arrived healthy and happy with normal delivery, and I couldn't be more grateful for the care we received.
If anyone facing similar challenges or just want a caring and capable doctor, to guide you through your pregnancy journey and delivery, I highly recommend reaching out to Dr.  Rachna Verma.

Thanks so much for your sweet words of appreciation
Really appreciate üôè

I moved to Bangalore in 2018 and was planning to conceive in 2022. I met a doctor in Bangalore however, the experience was very bad. That‚Äôs when I consulted with Dr Rachna over phone. Based on her able guidance and tests/scans suggested by her, I was able to conceive within 2 months.
I would recommend highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thanks so much dear for your sweet words of appreciation üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went for a normal check up for PCOD today,I was correctly diagnosed by Dr Verma but we were over charged for the ultrasound which she insisted to do there itself and almost forced  the medicines saying that we won't find them easily whereas they are available at every online store at 25%discount , we were not previously informed about ultrasound charges.The full abdomen ultrasound was charged to us @ Rs 2500 whereas anywhere outside it is for Rs1000, we verified from 2 more centres....
The hygiene was not up to the mark, after the ultrasound they were petty about even giving tissue to clean up and they were literally using toilet roll, whats to save money in that..so the visit to Dr Verma costed me - consultancy 1200 ,full abdomen ultrasound 2500,tab Floreva 1300 -total Rs 5000...I found the whole experience very unfair....
reply_text:
Mr Sandeep,
Firstly you never visited our clinic in person. You have written the review for your relative which should not be done.
Something seemed very wrong about this review, so i consulted my staff and checked our security cameras. 
Patient was advised whole abdomen ultrasound and never forced to be done charges of which are displayed at reception. Fortis next door charges 3100.
 I am sorry to say but if you were smart enough to write a negative review, you also were smart enough to check the medicine prices in our clinic online  on phone where the 25% discount had a cap of 50 rupees.  For tissues in ultrasound room,those were not toilet paper rolls, they are tissue rolls. You can google them (Wonder Kitchen Tissue Rolls on Amazon). We're sorry but if you can't afford high quality service, there are a lot of cheaper services out there with a lot more than 25% discount and no cappings. Still better would be going to GOVT HOSPITAL where consultation, investigation like ultrasound and prescribed medicines will be given FREE OF COST to you. We always try to give a holistic service to our patients under one roof for convenience. Giving bad reviews because you are having a bad day is not very nice.  This is a clinic with over 20 years of operations where we value our patients and the distress they are in, for which they need to seek our help. And keeping these in mind, we offer value and quality under one roof to provide the best doctor-patient relationship to whoever visits us. We are always open to honest constructive criticism and we are always striving to improve. We hope you have a better experience elsewhere. Get well soon .

review:
We visited Dr Rachna Verma in my 8th of pregnancy. when we ask our previous doctor about the pregnancy then she said that she only does regular checkup and examination. We were so worried don't know what to do in this covid-19 situation. We got to know about Dr Rachna Verma through my friend. 

When we visited Dr Rachna Verma after that we were so relaxed. The thing about Dr Rachna Verma is she understands her patients and listens to them and their questions very calmly. We have so many questions for her because we are going to have our first baby and she answered them all.

Now we are blessed with a baby boy and it was a normal delivery. 


Thank you so much Dr Rachna Verma for all you care and help. Thank you, thank you so much!!

I visited the clinic in my 32nd week of pregnancy. She explained and listened to all my health related issues very well.  I was pregnant with twins and was not able to eat anything during that time, keeping this in mind She took extra care of me. Even on holiday she especially came to see me. I delivered my twins via c-section and I am so impressed that c-section were carried out very efficiently and professionally. After healing even the scar is barely visible. 
I was given post operation assessment and care to insure a speedy and healthy recovery.
All thanks to Rachna ma'am, I have two beautiful children.

Moreover all the facilities and requirements are available in her own clinic lab. She is and she will be my best Doctor in my life. If anybody has any problem relating to pregnancy or any other kinds of ladies problem please do contact or take appointment with her immediately. Thank you Doctor for helping me out in every of my problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Words are less to describe such an amazing experience of 9 months. *** ** *** **** ****** I would say for pregnancy and other related gynaecology issues.The entire experience of 9 months was excellent as even during this pandemic, Mam was always available with a smile at any time of the day.Mam's guidance gave us strength and positivity throughout and made everything so smooth & simple. It was only her experience and treatment that made it so easy for me to have a normal delivery within a span of only 3 hours which would have been impossible otherwise.Mam tries for normal delivery till the end which is very rare nowadays.We are really thankful to her and Dr. Anand Verma Sir for their support, guidance throughout the journey and will recommend her to all my friends/relatives.
reply_text: Thanks so much Meenaxi Chhachiya for your sweet and encouraging words. This makes me work even harder and better for my patients ‚ò∫Ô∏è
